column5: is it any good in the winter??? Thanks!
Not in my experience. I found it to be a barren wasteland.  It was a very very tough nut to crack.  Only positive is the scenery.
One of the lodges' websites says that its a great lake trout lake. Not sure how true that is, but I personnaly have never heard of any great fishing on that lake.
Thanks guys! Gotta find a better place I guess...
Rented a day hut from Ravenscroft Lodge about 10 years ago. Hut sucked and not one bite all day targeting lakers.

Same and same.  We stayed at Ravenscroft Lodge (I think; 99% sure) and the dinners were good but that's all I can say good about the whole area.  9 guys with the white stripes on the backs after 3 days isn't a good time if you ask me.
My experience as well spent three days for bupkiss . Took Irishfields advice and started going 15 minutes further north and have never looked back.
I just noticed the 2nd part of your signature. HAHA! Nice.
It was too funny not to post it.
